name: RedGate
description:
RedGate is a game that saves people coming back and forth between two worlds.
Earcly Access Now.

World 1

People of this world live in peace.
By eating people living there, something points will be collected.
Attention to the robot being monitored. Continue to eat and combo occur.
Points are accumulating rapidly.

Between world 1 and world 2

We gain strength in exchange for points of something.
Please divide it into attack power, speed, physical strength.

World 2

People of this world are being attacked by enemies and seeking help.
However, enemies are strong.
If you realize that the enemy is stronger, it is also a strategy to return to World 1 once more.

If you saved World 2 people ...
